message: Let's get this started, Bob! Take the small share this round and I'll make it worth your while later.
You're starting strong, but I'm not falling for it. My turn to take a bigger bite.
You're taking a big bite, Bob. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get a fair share to make this worthwhile.
I'm not backing down, Alice. You're getting a good deal, but I need more to make it worth my while.
I'm getting desperate, Bob. I'll give you a bigger share, but I need to get something out of this.
It's getting close to the deadline, Alice. I'll meet you in the middle, but don't think this is the end of it.
I'm running out of options, Bob. I'll give you a bigger share, but I'm not giving up yet.
I'm not going to back down, Alice. I'll take a bigger share, and you can try to do better next round.
I'm running out of options, Bob. This is my last chance to get a decent share. Take it or leave it.
You're trying to strong-arm me, Alice, but I'm not afraid. I'll take a bigger share, and you can live with it.
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or we'll both walk away with nothing.
